name: Orchant Seleccion Orchie
additionalNotes:
We are proud to introduce you to the Alec Bradley Orchant Seleccion cigars which are exclusive to C.Gars Ltd and Turmeaus tobacconists.

Following on from the pre-release cigars which were greatly received at the launch events across the Turmeaus locations in late 2017. The cigars have been ready since early May 2017 but have been resting in Honduras until they are of absolute optimum smoking condition.
